name: SpeechRecognitionResult.length
description: The length read-only property of the SpeechRecognitionResult interface returns the length of the "array" — the number of SpeechRecognitionAlternative objects contained in the result (also referred to as "n-best alternatives".)

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'length' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
